title.en: Prayer to Jetsün Tārā for the Fulfilment of Wishes

text.en: Noble and compassionate Tārā, we pray to you:
text.en-trans: jetsün chomden dema tukjé chen

text.en: May I and all sentient beings, infinite in number,
text.en-trans: dak dang tayé semchen tamché kyi

text.en: Purify the two obscurations and swiftly perfect the two accumulations,
text.en-trans: drib nyi jang zhing tsok nyi nyur dzok né

text.en: And in so doing may we gain perfect enlightenment.
text.en-trans: dzokpé sangye tobpar dzé du sol

text.en: Until then, in all our lives,
text.en-trans: dé matob kyi tserab küntu yang

text.en: May we find supreme happiness among gods and human beings,
text.en-trans: lha dang mi yi dewa chok tob né

text.en: And may all obstacles to the attainment of omniscience,
text.en-trans: tamché khyenpa drubpar jepa la

text.en: As well as harmful influences and disease,
text.en-trans: barché dön gek rim dang né lasok

text.en: All that brings untimely death,
text.en-trans: dümin chiwar gyurpa natsok dang

text.en: All bad dreams and evil omens,
text.en-trans: milam ngen dang tsenma ngenpa dang

text.en: The eight major fears and all forms of harm,
text.en-trans: jikpa gyé sok nyewar tsewa nam

text.en: All be swiftly pacified and eliminated.
text.en-trans: nyurdu zhi zhing mepar dzé du sol

text.en: May auspiciousness, happiness and prosperity,
text.en-trans: jikten jikten lé ni depa yi

text.en: Both worldly and transcendent,
text.en-trans: tashi delek pünsum tsokpa nam

text.en: Flourish and expand, and may all our wishes
text.en-trans: pel zhing gyepé dön nam malüpa

text.en: Be effortlessly and spontaneously fulfilled.
text.en-trans: bemé lhün gyi drubpar dzé du sol

text.en: May we endeavour in the practice, may the Dharma spread,
text.en-trans: drub la tsön zhing damchö pelwa dang

text.en: May we always meditate on you, and behold your perfect face,
text.en-trans: taktu khyé drub zhal chok tongwa dang

text.en: May we realize the nature of emptiness, and
text.en-trans: tongnyi dön tok changsem rinpoche

text.en: May precious bodhicitta develop and expand, just like the waxing moon.
text.en-trans: yarngö da tar pel zhing gyepar dzö
